channel.title: Post your loot
channel.description:
For all the others out there who celebrate this holiday, what'd you guys get?
-Crossfade LP headphones -BLOPS2 -phone screen fixed -multiple running shoes (minimalist and normal) -Clothes (pants, jackets, hat, scarf) -cologne (for the ladies...) -Various chocolates
Didn't ask for much, was a successful haul. How about you guys?

item.title: Post your loot
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:59, topic:476022”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=594170.msg4191172#msg4191172 date=1356827413]

Wait what, why would you get all three of those for christmas? So redundant

a phone
2 tablets with different os’s
i had a iphone for 2 years
i decided to try out android again
because Xoom sucked
and non google flagship tablets/phones suck
they dont recieve os updates which is retarded
so xoom only had shitty honey comb
and who the hell made the names for these os, seems like a fatass but
i hope ics, JB is good ^^
I have a windows desktop purely for gaming and
mac book pro for editing
[/quote]
It’s pretty annoying
How you talk like this
Just so you know
Never ending a sentence
Never really starting a new one
It’s like a run-on sentence
and it is a bitch to read
you know what I’m saying?
or should I continue?

Also, what you said
was completely irrelevant
to what
I asked
you didn’t answer my question at all
I said having three tablets was redundant
I said nothing about phones, I don’t give a love what your phone is[/quote]
thats 2 tablets I said, stating the nexus 4 is a phone
I want a tablet I am used too
And I want to try a newer version android

Read full topic

item.title: Post your loot
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[ul][li]Mostly money[/li]
[li]Some music wall decorations for my room[/li]
[li]A lot of candy and other food.[/li]
[li]Small tools like a magnet for my spare key on my car and that[/li]
[li]Also got some new clothes, my girlfriend got me a sweatshirt from my future college and spent the day with me as well.[/li][/ul]

Most of my gifts were in money form. I prefer that, then I can buy what I wish or just save it if I don’t really need anything at the time. I’ll probably go out and buy an iHome, programming books, and put some money in my Steam account. The rest might go to a new sound system in my car (need this badly) and the rest goes to the bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your loot
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:42, topic:476022”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=594170.msg4188605#msg4188605 date=1356548170]

$400+new custom-built computer+new 21.5" LED monitor

Success

Must be an AMD.

My bad, let me pay $200 extra on a processor to get the “top-of-the-line” brand name. You must also like Apple.

Nope, I in fact don’t like Apple. But if you’re going to spend decent money on a computer you could have at least opted to have a half way decent processor.
[/quote]
It was a joke about how you’re paying for the brand if you get a mac.
And LOL if you don’t think AMD has decent processors. Do some loveing research before you claim to be the authority on processors[/quote]
AMD makes decent processors, like the bulldozer FX 8150 (which is in my loving build)
Its the best 180 dollars I’ve spent on a processor, just because intel makes more money
doesnt make AMD inferior. I know on some i7s i5s i3s
you get integrated Intel HD 3000, 4000 graphics which is both better than GTX 630m
but with 8 cores clocked at 3.6ghz I took the bulldozer, its amazing
and Amd makes amazing gpus too but i took GTX 680 because it was on sale
tho the radeon 7970 is def no slouch, and for the price it does some decent future proofing
3gb radeon 7970 for 380$ is nice.
Decent builds aren’t cheap.
and dude guys, sony is the biggest ripoffs in the computer industry
look at what graphics card they pack in their laptops
look at what apple offers in their imac
tho i would prefer building my own pc
Do some research

OT:
ipad mini
nexus 7
nexus 4
(BIGGEST CHRISTMAS EVER, On my way to college)

Read full topic

item.title: Post your loot
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:47, topic:476022”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=594170.msg4189470#msg4189470 date=1356647083]
Modded Controller (by the way just to tell you all do not buy from rapidmodz.com they loveed me over)
[/quote]What was wrong with it, iirc i bought one from them awhile back and it was fine.[/quote]

I can’t remember everything, but my fast reload doesn’t reload any faster AT ALL. And my dropshot doesn’t even look like its been added to the controller, since the button sequence doesn’t even make the LED twinkle, and my rapid mod freezes alot (like if I’m shooting an fal or pistol it will randomly freeze and i have to knife to be able to shoot again) i got ripped of well near 30$

Read full topic

item.title: Post your loot
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

I’m a little late on this but:

Hauppauge HD PVR 2 Gaming Edition (used for recording ps3/xbox/pc gameplay one of the top recorders out there)
2 Northface Jackets (200$ each, i only needed one but each of my parents got one, they don’t co op well around the holidays lol)
.243 Hunting Rifle
Modded Controller (by the way just to tell you all do not buy from rapidmodz.com they fucked me over)
the rest was clothes and chocolate. i didnt ask for much this christmas but i got around a 1k value which is more then ive ever gotten i believe lol
